metadata.title: Perform immunofluorescence analysis for HA tag and lineage markers at day 24

params.note: Immunofluorescence analysis on day 24 revealed HA-tag+ SMCs and fibroblasts but also CMs (Fig. 5b, Supplementary Video 3 and Extended Data Fig. 9c), supporting fate potentiality inferred from gene expression (Fig. 1h,i).
